Articles.Content: I have downloaded Mechjeb and put everything in the right folders but when i launch the game i get stuck on the initial loading screen and the bar gets stuck on Mumech_Mechjebpod and never loads any farther is there a fix to this. also what is the latest version of mechjeb cause for all i know i have an old one and that might be causing the issue. Thanks

Delete any old versions of mechjeb. But in my opinion, don\'t use mechjeb. Where\'s then fun in flying a rocket when a computer does it for you?

Also, welcome to the forums!

But in my opinion, don\'t use mechjeb. Where\'s then fun in flying a rocket when a computer does it for you?

I am pretty sure that even as early as the mercury-redstone rockets computers were part of the control system... I, personally, have more of a problem wrapping my head around complete manual control than I do having some form of \'autopilot\' on-board.

In MY opinion, there should be at least some rudimentary autopilot integrated with the current command modules, as that is more \'realistic\' and historically appropriate than manually strong-arming rockets into orbit.

Now, to address the OP, older versions of mechjeb do not work in .16, and the command modules will cause the game to freeze on loading, what you need to do is download the most recent version (1.9 i think) from the mechjeb topic and install that.

I am pretty sure that even as early as the mercury-redstone rockets computers were part of the control system... I, personally, have more of a problem wrapping my head around complete manual control than I do having some form of \'autopilot\' on-board.

In MY opinion, there should be at least some rudimentary autopilot integrated with the current command modules, as that is more \'realistic\' and historically appropriate than manually strong-arming rockets into orbit.

Now, to address the OP, older versions of mechjeb do not work in .16, and the command modules will cause the game to freeze on loading, what you need to do is download the most recent version (1.9 i think) from the mechjeb topic and install that.

That must have come off the wrong way. I just don\'t like the ascent autopilot. Where\'s the fun in it? I understand it\'s more historically accurate, but it makes people lazy. I had to learn how to fly rockets again because I abused mechjeb. Regardless, it is a fantastically written plugin, and I still do use it for orbital info.

Thanks for the info. ill try the latest version (i had 1.8.4) and get back to you all. And i know how to fly the rocket and ive gotten ships to orbit Kerbin easily enough i just want to use it as a learning material not an autopilot.

Thanks for the info. ill try the latest version (i had 1.8.4) and get back to you all. And i know how to fly the rocket and ive gotten ships to orbit Kerbin easily enough i just want to use it as a learning material not an autopilot.

Great! Sorry if I was harsh. Truth be told, mechjeb taught me how to gravity turn more efficiently.
